scripts.build:web: npm run web:export --workspace packages/app && rm -rf firebase/hosting/public && mkdir -p firebase/hosting/public && cp -r packages/app/dist/* firebase/hosting/public/
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:web && npx firebase deploy --only hosting --project $FIREBASE_PROJECT --config firebase/firebase.json
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build --workspace firebase/functions && npx firebase deploy --only functions --project $FIREBASE_PROJECT --config firebase/firebase.json
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:web && npm run build --workspace firebase/functions && npx firebase deploy --project $FIREBASE_PROJECT --config firebase/firebase.json
